Articles.Content:
I challenge you to build a Perpetual Miner!

That means a miner that can churn out the maximum amount of fuel per second without ever having to stop, recharge, build up more ore, or turn anything off.

You are really good at mining if you can do this. Good luck!

Edited February 5, 2016 by quasarrgames

7 minutes ago, quasarrgames said:

I challenge you to build a Perpetual Miner!

That means a miner that can churn out the maximum amount of fuel per second without ever having to stop, recharge, build up more ore, or turn anything off.

You are really good at mining if you can do this. Good luck!

Wrong thread for this.

Figured it wasn't worth challenge thread since there's no scoring, and it's not a competition, merely a "can you make this?" thread.

In fact, i'll change the name to suit it better.
